column2: Completed the database migration project ahead of schedule. The new system is 30% faster and more reliable. Need to update documentation next week.
Finished the UI redesign for the customer portal. User testing showed 25% improvement in user satisfaction. Will deploy to production on Friday.
Fixed critical security vulnerabilities in the authentication system. Implemented two-factor authentication. All tests are passing.
Coordinated with the marketing team on the product launch. Prepared training materials for customer support. Launch scheduled for next month.
